titleStmt.title: [Legal report consisting of the] names of persons charged with the killing of Cherokee Indians on or about Jan. 24, 1813 : a machine readable transcription of an image

publicationStmt.publisher: University of Tennessee Special Collections Library

availability.p: This work is the property of the Special Collections Library, University of Tennessee, Knoxville, TN. It may be used freely by individuals for research, teaching, and personal use as long as this statement of availability is included in the text. For all other use contact the Special Collections Librarian, Hoskins Library, University of Tennessee, 1401 Cumberland Avenue, Knoxville, TN 37996. (865) 974-4480.

bibl.title: [Legal report consisting of the] names of persons charged with the killing of Cherokee Indians on or about Jan. 24, 1813
bibl.note: This legal report consists of a list of names of men who were present and involved in the shooting of two Cherokee men, Dick Benge and Jacket, in the vicinity of Battle Creek on or around January 24, 1813.

projectDesc.p: Created for the University of Tennessee Digital Library

editorialDecl.p: Quotation marks retained as data except inside q tags
Errors in transcription of the printed text controlled with X-Metal 2.1 spell-checker; text has also been thoroughly proofread.
Corrections and normalization represented by editorial tags.
Catchwords and directional notes such as "turn page over" have been omitted.

refsDecl.p: ID attributes provided for only those pages, chapters, or illustrations toward which a reference or figure points.

div.p: Names of persons who are said to have been present and acting in the shooting & killing of two Cherokees in the Cherokee Nation. The names of the Cherokees were Dick Binge a half blood Cherokee the other named Jacket a Cherokee, the acts of killing as above stated were done on or about the 24th January 1813 at a place in the vicinity of Battle Creek. viz

closer.signed: Jeremiah Jeffrey Jeffrey the younger Daniel Roberts Fally Ragsdales}These have moved on Indian Lands_James Cowan_ Condry
closer.add: It is said that Daniel Roberts shot Dick Benge.
Names of Persons charged with the killing of two Cherokee Indians 24th January _1813_
